title: "Imaging disrupter Nanox acquiring AI firm, teleradiology outfit for total of $230M"
excerpt: "Imaging disrupter Nanox is acquiring both an artificial intelligence firm and a teleradiology outfit for a total of $230 million, the three companies announced Tuesday. The publicly traded startup has agreed to pony up $200 million in its own company shares to acquire Zebra Medical Vision."
